If you keep the src and test tree's seperated (but same packages) it becomes
very easy, just tell the javadoc to create the docs from the src dir.

> Having decided to put the unit tests in classes named TestFoo 
> (where Foo is

> rather the Ant
> javadoc task) to not generate docs for the test classes?
